Welcome to the blog for Dockerized web applications

By: Darshan Mangrola (21BCP140)

This is a basic how-to for creating a Docker-based WebÂ Application.

There are three sections to the guide.

  • You can access Section 1 in the navigation bar to learn how to create a database and connect it to the web application.

  • By selecting Section 2 in the navbar, you can access the second section, which covers configuring backend services and connecting them to the web application and database.

  • By selecting Section 3 from the navbar, you can access the third section, which covers how to set up the frontend and connect it to the database, backend services, and web application.

    • Citation This is a github link to the MERN stack todo list that was containerized with Docker.
